title: MBMBaM 544: Quantum Cheez-Its
description:
We realize it’s going to be a while before we’re all out and about, attending hip dinner parties with our fashionable pals. Still, it’s always good to refresh yourself on basic party etiquette, like how to provide a Cheez-It experience that won’t shatter the host’s perception of reality. 

Suggested talking points: Reggie Notes, Mystery Can, The Hiding Crop, Papa King, The Opposite of Bread 

Ways to support Black Lives Matter and find anti-racism resources: https://linktr.ee/blacklivesmatter
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Justin McElroy)
